-e ---

Franco semitic prefix, just an article glued to the word:
leather= le der
𒋞 libittu bitumen
Lebanon the white one
𓆇𓄣𓏤 L'Ieb ⇔ Liebe
אָהַב l'aháv love
Algebra اَلْجَبْر al-jabr ⇔ 𓂝 geber?

Semites often don't distinguish between le and al and just write ל

link = le.nexus *hlank(iz) “ring” ⇔ anchor

𓂋 re à (abstract locative pointative?)
